titles.title: A resolution to require unanimous consent of the Senate that the Journal is up to date.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 2/19/1987--Introduced. Amends rule IV of the Standing Rules of the Senate to require unanimous consent of the Senate that the Journal is up to date when the Senate is proceeding under cloture. (Currently, the reading of the Journal is dispensed with and considered approved to date.)
